display.title: Patterns
description: &&aPatterns&&r are used for AE2 autocrafting. Using &&aPolyvinyl Chloride&&r increases the yield by &&64 times&&r, and higher-tier plastics have even greater yields.
Don't get too excited, though - to really get into the automation side of AE2, you'll need to get some &&dSilicon Ingots&&r first.

A sub-note for autocrafting... whilst it's possible to perform chemical chains on-demand with AE2, doing so can build some bad habits that'll come back around to bite you in higher tiers. We urge you to passive things wherever you can.
